did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: The UA Presents Records contains materials related to the performing arts series seasons at the University of Arizona, spanning the years of 1991 to 2011.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: UA Presents Records (MS 566). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Originally known as the Office of Cultural Affairs until 1995, UA Presents is the official performing arts presenter of the University of Arizona, that brings art and cultural events to Centennial Hall on campus. Throughout its existence, the series put on has included performances in theatre, dance, spoken word, classical, jazz and world music.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 3 series

list.item: Series I: UA Presents Series Seasons Materials, 1995 - 2011
Series III: Miscellaneous Artist and Theater Materials, 2000 - 2002

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains materials including programs, marketing information, flyers, and published articles on the organization itself, on its former director Ken Foster, on the series of events UA Presents has put on, as well as various artist and theater marketing materials.
Arranged chronologically, this series contains the programs, marketing materials, flyers, and published articles on UA Present's shows of past seasons from 1995 – 2011.

scopecontent.p: Arranged alphabetically, this series contains articles pertaining to the organization of UA Presents such as its ticket sales and finances, articles on its former director, Ken Foster (1994 – 2003), as well as marketing materials showcasing the season as a whole.
